alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 4:37AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Estill, northeastern Jackson and southwestern Lee Counties through 515 AM EDT... At 437 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Blackburn, or 8 miles southwest of Irvine, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rice Station, Weedon and Sandhill around 440 AM EDT. Irvine, Locust Branch, Witt, Wisemantown, Hisel, South Irvine and West Irvine around 445 AM EDT. Ravenna, Jinks, Station Camp, Alcorn and Doe Creek around 450 AM EDT. Blanton Flats, Wagersville and Brazil around 455 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Drip Rock, Alumbaugh, Foxtown, Shade, Texola, Wind Cave, Lakes, Leighton, Evelyn, Macedonia, Old Orchard, Arvel, Turkey Foot, Willow Shoals, Pinnacle and New Zion. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
